D

DeckCommon - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.distributable
DeckCommon is an implementation of the Distributable interface, it deals with commonCards, It can be used to draw common cards.
DeckCommon(int, String) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.distributable.DeckCommon
The DeckCommon constructor initialize the deck with the given attributes
DeckPersonal - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.distributable
DeckPersonal is an implementation of the Distributable interface, it deals with personalCards, It can be used to draw personal cards.
DeckPersonal(String, String) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.distributable.DeckPersonal
The deckPersonal constructor assign the configurations parameters in order to create the cards.
Distributable<T> - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.distributable
Distributable is an interface used for collections of elements that must be distributed, such as cards or tiles.
draw(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.distributable.BagHolder
This method is used to draw a certain number of tiles from the bag
draw(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.distributable.DeckCommon

draw(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.distributable.DeckPersonal
